block.mob_grinding_utils.dragon_muffler: 終界龍死亡音效消除器
block.mob_grinding_utils.ender_inhibitor: 終界抑制器 未啟用
A larger version of the Singularity Tank, Holds 1024 buckets worth of any liquid.
block.mob_grinding_utils.xpsolidifier.je: Solidifies Fluid XP using moulds to create edible xp jellies.
block.mob_grinding_utils.tinted_glass.je: Allows you to see the inside of the mob farm without letting light inside.
block.mob_grinding_utils.dreadful_dirt.j: Rapidly spawns monsters in the dark, will burn if exposed to the sky during the day.
一塊塊凝固的經驗值，很有彈性，超有趣。
block.mob_grinding_utils.delightfull_dir: Rapidly spawns creatures in the light, will snow-cap if exposed to the sky during the night.
item.mob_grinding_utils.saw_upgrade_smit: 怪物搗碎器亡靈殺手升級
item.mob_grinding_utils.saw_upgrade_arth: 怪物搗碎節肢剋星升級
block.mob_grinding_utils.fan.tooltip_1: Pushes Mobs in the facing direction.
block.mob_grinding_utils.fan.tooltip_2: Can be modified with Mob Fan Upgrades.
block.mob_grinding_utils.fan.tooltip_3: Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
block.mob_grinding_utils.saw.tooltip_2: Can be enhanced with Mob Masher Upgrades.
block.mob_grinding_utils.saw.tooltip_3: Mobs Mashed DO count as Player Kills.
block.mob_grinding_utils.absorption_hopp: Vacuums up Items and XP Orbs in a 7x7x7 area.
Can be configured to push out on any side.
Fluids will insert to Tanks and Items to Inventories.
Range is increased by Absorption Radius Upgrades.
Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
Position can be offset in it's gui.
block.mob_grinding_utils.spikes.tooltip_: Basic spikes - will also drop Mob's XP.
Mobs killed by spikes DO NOT count as Player Kills.
block.mob_grinding_utils.xp_tap.tooltip_: Attach to the side of a Tank.
Will turn Fluid XP back to Orbs.
Right Click to hide Boss Bar.
Right Click to hide Boss Bar.
And they said it couldn't be done...
block.mob_grinding_utils.entity_conveyor: Conveyor to move Mobs and Items along a Horizontal Vector.
Mobs Can Spawn on this Block.
block.mob_grinding_utils.ender_inhibitor: Inhibits Teleportation for Entities up to 8 Blocks away.
Can be attached on ANY side of Solid Blocks.
Inhibits Teleportation for Entities up to 8 Blocks away.
Can be attached on ANY side of Solid Blocks.
block.mob_grinding_utils.tinted_glass.to: Glass blocks designed to prevent light.
block.mob_grinding_utils.dreadful_dirt.t: Will Ignite in Daylight if Exposed to the Sky.
Light level of 10 and above Stops Hostile Mob Spawns.
block.mob_grinding_utils.delightful_dirt: Will Snow-Cap at Night if Exposed to the Sky.
Light level below 10 Stops Creature Mob Spawns.
block.mob_grinding_utils.xpsolidifier.to: Requires an XP Mould and Fluid XP in its Tank.
Can be configured to export Horizontally.
Speed is increased with XP Speed Upgrades.
Can Spawn Mobs in a 3x3x1 area.
Uses a Mob Egg in the Top Slot.
Fuelled by Solid XP Jelly Babies.
Enhanced with XP Speed Upgrades and Spawner Height/Width Upgrades.
Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
Position can be offset in it's gui.
tooltip.hopperupgrade: 吸取漏斗範圍：+1，最多放置6個。
tooltip.fanupgrade_width: 風扇寬度範圍：+1，最多放置3個。
tooltip.fanupgrade_height: 風扇高度範圍：+1，最多放置3個。
tooltip.fanupgrade_distance: 風扇距離範圍：+1，最多放置10個。
tooltip.chickenfeed_2: 這樣使用雞是一次性的……
tooltip.mobswab_2: 用一桶XP液和一粒小麥種子合成
tooltip.rotten_egg_1: Creates a 5x5 area of Dreadful Dirt.
tooltip.rotten_egg_2: 用於草地、泥土、菌絲土、耕地。
tooltip.golden_egg_1: Creates a 5x5 area of Delightful Dirt.
tooltip.golden_egg_2: 用於草地、泥土、菌絲土、耕地。
